name: Star-Fishing
description:
In the far future, fishing in space becomes a very popular sport where people compete each other by catching as much stars as they can. Some stars are worth more than common stars, but they are stronger than them (stronger enough to break lures and rods!). You and up to 4 friends must compete to get as much points as they can from stars they've manage to catch for their collections. Whoever earns the most star points wins. Good luck catching as many stars as you can for bragging rights!

Link to the game: https://playingcards.io/zdmezv

Additional notes (mainly for a physical game): 

  • Rules can also be printable as cards that you can holepunch and use a keyring to hold them together
  • Each type of card & piece are also printable (keep in mind most of them are required to be duplicated to an appropriate amount); separate spinner/10-faced die is needed as well.
